summary: This document is an email chain from August 2019 between FBI personnel discussing outreach to a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The victim, located in West Palm Beach, is seeking counseling services due to distress caused by Epstein's suicide and media attention. The emails include referrals to victim service organizations.

persons.name: Victim Specialist
persons.context: FBI Victim Specialist who spoke with an Epstein victim, provided resources, and offered further assistance.

events.title: Epstein's Suicide
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's suicide is referenced as an event causing significant distress to a victim.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim in West Palm Beach reached out for counseling services due to distress from Epstein's suicide and media attention.
FBI Victim Specialists coordinated to provide referrals to organizations like Catholic Charities and Palm Beach County Victim Services.
The email chain highlights the ongoing impact of the Epstein case on victims following his death in August 2019.
The correspondence is protected under the Electronic Communications Privacy Act, indicating its sensitive nature.
Multiple redacted names are present in the email chain, suggesting confidentiality of victim and possibly law enforcement personnel identities.
